oopdatabase

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • oopdatabase.Account
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminAccount, EmployeeAccount

    public abstract class Account
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an abstract class and a parent class at the same time and have a subclass like AdminAccount and Employee account. This class only sets the password,name, and the login method.
    Author:
    Joseph Chaves, Christian Mabao

      • logIn

        public boolean logIn(int Id,
                     char[] Password)
        This method returns a boolean expression and has a behavior to check the id and password id valid during log in.
        Parameters:
        Id - the id of the account to log in
        Password - the password of the account to be log in
        Returns:
        returns true if the credentials are correct otherwise returns false
